summary: A musical tone is a repeating sound.
full_text: The tonne   or metric ton  is a non-SI metric unit of mass equal to 1,000 kilograms; or one megagram ; it is equivalent to approximately 2,204.6 pounds, 1.10 short tons  or 0.984 long tons . Although not part of the SI per se, the tonne is "accepted for use with" SI units and prefixes by the International Committee for Weights and Measures, along with several other units like the bar, litre and day.
title: Tonne
